sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id, user_type
FROM m_users
WHERE user_mobile = :P1 /* {{$_GET.mobile}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountIP
FROM t_login_history
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND ip_address = :P2 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */

INSERT INTO t_login_history
(user_id, ip_address, login_time, remote_ip, login_from, server) VALUES (:P1 /* {{getSalt.id}} */, :P2 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, :P4 /* {{$_SERVER.SERVER_NAME}} */, :P5 /* {{'Android'}} */, :P6 /* {{tokEn}} */)

SELECT m_api.api_code, m_api.username, m_api.api_password, m_api.api_type, m_api.senderid, m_api.api_url, sms_api.sms_code, sms_api.entity_id, sms_api.template_id
FROM m_api AS m_api
LEFT JOIN t_sms_api_details AS sms_api ON (sms_api.api_id = m_api.id)
WHERE m_api.api_type = :P1 /* {{'SMS'}} */ AND m_api.status = 1 AND sms_api.sms_code = :P2 /* {{'OTP'}} */ AND sms_api.status = '1'

params.message: {{'Your one time password is '+OTP+'\nRegards S W Pays'}}

values.value: {{'Your one time password is '+OTP+' \\nRegards S W Pays'}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO t_sms_log
(sms_message, sender_mobile, created_on, sms_type, ip_address, status, response, user_id, extra1) VALUES (:P1 /* {{'Your one time password is '+OTP+' \\nRegards S W Pays'}} */, :P2 /* {{$_GET.mobile}} */, :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, :P4 /* {{'Android Login OTP'}} */, :P5 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P6 /* {{api_status == 200 ? 1 : 0}} */, :P7 /* {{api_response}} */, :P8 /* {{getSalt.id}} */, :P9 /* {{'Web'}} */)

params.name: :P1
params.value: {{'Your one time password is '+OTP+' \\nRegards S W Pays'}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO forgot_otp
(mobile, otp, entytime, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_GET.mobile}} */, :P2 /* {{OTP}} */, :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, :P4 /* {{1}} */)

SELECT api_code, username, api_password, api_type, senderid, api_url
FROM m_api
WHERE api_type = :P1 /* {{'Whatsapp'}} */ AND status = 1

params.message: {{'Your one time password is '+OTP+'\nRegards S W Pays'}}
